law.catch_line: ** IN EFFECT UNTIL OCTOBER 1, 2013 PER CHAPTER 570 OF 2012**...
law.text:
** IN EFFECT UNTIL OCTOBER 1, 2013 PER CHAPTER 570 OF 2012**
From among its members, the Board annually shall elect a chairman, a vice chairman, and a secretary.
The manner of election of officers shall be as the Board determines.
